text:
Hello everyone, I'd like to know if there's a way to set up a custom code or workflow for this: I have an apartment (custom property) for 2 different deals, and I'd like to be able to display the apartments whose deal 1 end date is equal to deal 2 start date.

like this Hello everyone, I'd like to know if there's a way to set up a custom code or workflow for this: I have an apartment (custom property) for 2 different deals, and I'd like to be able to display the apartments whose deal 1 end date is equal to deal 2 start date.

thank you for your help
